ModMetaData.name: Craftable Royalty Weapons (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Coldzero
ModMetaData.description:
The original work is and forever will be, by Misha.
Original Description: Allows crafting of the Monosword, the Plasmasword and the Zeushammer (both linkable and non-linkable versions) through a single techprint-locked research.
Now also allows the crafting of the psyfocus equipment such as the Psyfocus staff, shirt, vest and robes through another techprint-locked research.
